item.description:
Putting this out there for this summer...there is a Groupon for a Family Funyak trip, which sounds like fun and low-key enough for younger kids. I bought the Groupon and thought it would be fun to get a group out there.

http://www.groupon.com/deals/crab-apple-whitewater-1?post_purchase=true

Â 

The date has been set for July 28th. Everyone needs to make their own reservations and payment. The link above will take you to the Groupon, which will provide you with the information/link to the company website.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Whitewater Rafting--Kid Friendly
